InstructionData.Title: Pump Monitor and Control
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Pump Monitor and Control # Model: VPMC-100​ [ ZeroOne Corporation ] alias Pump d0​ alias Display d1​ alias setting r0​ alias lastSetting r1 alias active r2 alias t0 r10​ ​move lastSetting -1
start:​ l setting db Setting​ sne t0 setting lastSetting bgtz t0 done min setting setting 100​ max setting setting 0​ sge active setting 0 # active if Pump Setting >= 0​ s Pump Setting setting​ s Pump On active​ s Display Setting setting​ move lastSetting setting done: yield​ j start
